org.apache.wiki.event
Interface WikiEventListener

All Superinterfaces:
EventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultAdminBeanManager, GroupManager, PageManager, PageViewPlugin.PageViewManager, ReferenceManager, RenderingManager, RSSThread, SearchManager, WikiBackgroundThread, WikiSession, WorkflowManager
public interface WikiEventListener
extends EventListener

Defines an interface for an object that listens for WikiEvents.

Since:
2.3.92
